original_title: Maling Akala: Ang Misteryo ng Unamuno
overview: A look back on a legendary Philippine mythical creature and a mischievous child, let’s witness their journey through the woods after a calamity hit their village, Unamuno. How did their paths crossed as Ron Ron’s innocence and honesty rises up among their biggest misconception.
title: Misconception: The Mystery of Unamuno
